allow: Bash("c:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root expense_tracker -e "SELECT id, user_id, folder_id FROM receipts;")
Bash("c:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root expense_tracker -e "SELECT id, user_id, name, icon FROM receipt_folders;")
Bash("c:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root expense_tracker --default-character-set=utf8mb4 -e "SELECT id, name, icon FROM receipt_folders;")
Bash("c:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root expense_tracker -e "ALTER TABLE receipts ADD COLUMN reimbursement_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT ''none'' AFTER amount;")
Bash("c:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root expense_tracker -e "SELECT id, file_path FROM receipts;")
Bash("c:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root expense_tracker -e "DELETE FROM receipts WHERE id = 11;")
